name: Curried Devilled Eggs
description: An Indian-inspired twist on a familiar classic.
preparation: Halve eggs lengthwise and carefully remove yolks.
In a bowl, mash yolks with a fork. Blend in mayonnaise, curry powder, and salt until well combined.
Spoon yolk mixture into egg white halves.
